data.title: Top 20 Surf Hotels near Sant Antonio Di Gallura
data.meta_description: APRIL 2024. Sara Fuchs's Guide to the best Surf Hotels near Sant Antonio Di Gallura, Italy. We have also included surf-friendly holiday homes, guest houses and  country houses.Hand-picked guide with the best Surf Hotels near Sant Antonio Di Gallura.
data.text:
1 Li Espi Country Resort

27+

images

Country House. Surrounded by the Gallura countryside, AgriRistoChic offers a peaceful location and a restaurant, just 3 km from the beach at Porto Pollo. All air-conditioned rooms include a balcony or patio. Windsurfing and kite surfing are popular sports in this area, and guests have a discount on equipment hire at the nearby beach. Colourful rooms at Li Espi Country Resort are set in traditional Stazzu houses. Each has a private bathroom with hairdryer and toiletry set. Some rooms overlook the garden, others offer views of Corsica across the Bonifacio Strait. A sweet breakfast is served in a buffet style, while continental breakfast is available upon request. Bikes can be rented from reception. The resort is 5 km from Palau and a 45-minute drive from Olbia Airport. An airport shuttle is available upon request. Show full description

Hotel rating: 8.2 (very good)

Rooms: 5

Price: to show price

Distance: 20 km

Show room prices

2 HÃ´tel du Golfe

27+

images

Situated in the SantâAmanza Gulf with 2 km of coast, 100 metres from the sea, this hotel features air-conditioned rooms, a restaurant with a shady terrace and a bar. Renovated in 2016, each guest room at HÃ´tel du Golfe includes a private bathroom with a shower, and an LCD TV with satellite channels. The area is popular for windsurfing and guests can rent boats or practice other water sports such as paddle boarding. Horse riding, tennis and kite surfing are also possible in the surroundings. Some have a view of the maquis or of the sea. Guests can relax and enjoy the panoramic view of the gulf from the restaurantâs terrace. In the springtime, guests can admire the wild orchids and other rare flowers that grow near the property. Bonifacio is 7 km away and the SpÃ©rone golf course is 11 km from the property. Porto Vecchio and Figari Corse-Sud Airport are within 25 km. Show full description

Hotel rating: 8.4 (very good)

Rooms: 8

Price: to show price

Distance: 46 km

Show room prices

3 Centro Vacanze Isuledda

27+

images

Set on the seafront on the Gulf of Arzachena, Centro Vacanze Isuledda overlooks the Maddalena Archipelago National Park. It features a sea-view wellness centre, a Mediterranean restaurant, a pizzeria and 2 bars. Sports activities here include windsurfing and scuba diving. The Isuledda offers a variety of accommodation options including rooms and mobile homes. Each unit comes with a TV and private bathroom with shower. Mobile homes include a kitchenette too. Air conditioned/heating is free for some units, while others can request it at an extra charge. The property includes a wellness centre with sea views There are a number of dining options covering all kinds of cuisine, from pizza to BBQ. In the evening, you can enjoy music at the piano bar and live entertainment. You are just 20 a minutes drive from Porto Cervo. Show full description

Hotel rating: 7.6 (pleasant)

Rooms: 30

Stars: 4

Price: to show price

Distance: 20 km

Show room prices

4 Camping Village Capo D'Orso

27+

images

Camp Site. Camping Capo DâOrso is located in Arzachena. The beach along the Gulf of Saline is 5 minutesâ walk away. The entertainment staff offer sailing, windsurfing, and scuba diving lessons for a fee. Motor boat excursions and archaeological hiking are also available at Arzachena Camping. The restaurant is a self-service pizzeria with indoor and outdoor seating. A full-service bar and mini-market are available as well. Free WiFi is available in this area. The property is 5 km from Palau city centre and 13 km from the Archipelago of La Maddalena. The Costa Smeralda Airport is 31 km away. Show full description

Hotel rating: 7.9 (pleasant)

Rooms: 62

Price: to show price

Distance: 21 km

Show room prices

5 Hotel Grand Relais Dei Nuraghi

27+

images

Luxury Hotel. Set in one of the most beautiful and tranquil areas of Baja Sardinia, the Grand Relais Dei Nuraghi boasts a panoramic view over the whole Archipelago of Maddalena and the Gulf of Arzachena. Spend your days relaxing by the swimming pool, or venture further afield to take part in a variety of sports, such as tennis, sailing and windsurfing. At night the village turns into something extraordinary: bars and clubs open until dawn, open-air markets where you can find anything from the most bizarre trinkets to the most traditional local crafts are weaved throughout the town square, where you can enjoy music, dancing and all kinds of shows. Completely immersed in the greenery of the typical Mediterranean scrub, amongst ancient junipers and pink granite rocks, the Grand Relais Dei Nuraghi offers an oasis of tranquillity, just a few steps away from a number of little beaches. Show full description

Hotel rating: 8.5 (very good)

Rooms: 23

Stars: 5

Price: to show price

Distance: 22 km

Show room prices

6 Affittacamere Arcipelago

27+

images

Guest House. Affittacamere Arcipelago is situated in Murta Maria, just a 5-minute drive from Porto Istana Beach. Each room at this guest house is air conditioned and features a Smart TV. This guest house has water sports facilities and bike hire is available. You can engage in various activities, such as horse riding, snorkelling and windsurfing. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. Some rooms feature a kitchen. The rooms come with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes and free toiletries. There is a tour desk at the property. Olbia is 9 km from Affittacamere Arcipelago, while San Tedodoro is less than a 30-minute drive from the property. The nearest airport is Olbia Costa Smeralda Airport, 6 km from the property. Show full description

Hotel rating: 8.8 (fabulous)

Rooms: 5

Price: to show price

Distance: 27 km

Show room prices

7 Residence Hotel Nuraghe

27+

images

Apartment hotel. Set within 100 metres of Spiaggia Ira and 400 metres of Spiaggia Punta Nuraghe, Residence Hotel Nuraghe offers rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Porto Rotondo. Situated on the beachfront, this property has an infinity pool, a garden and a tennis court. For guests with children, the aparthotel features outdoor play equipment and a kids' club. Guests at Residence Hotel Nuraghe can enjoy table tennis on-site, or go windsurfing or canoeing in the surroundings. Featuring family rooms, this property also provides guests with a sun terrace. The accommodation comes with a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with bidet, shower and a hair dryer, while the kitchenette features a dishwasher, a microwave and a fridge. Each unit comes with a safety deposit box and free WiFi, while certain rooms will provide you with a balcony. The units feature a wardrobe. There is a snack bar, and a minimarket is also available. Sassi Beach is 2.5 km from the accommodation, while Olbia Harbour is 19 km away. The nearest airport is Olbia Costa Smeralda Airport, 20 km from Residence Hotel Nuraghe. Show full description

Hotel rating: 7.7 (pleasant)

Rooms: 21

Price: to show price

Distance: 20 km

Show room prices

8 Isola Rossa Appartamenti Paduledda

27+

images

Apartment hotel. Set on the hills of Isola Rossa, just 2 km from the centre and less than 5 minutesâ drive from the seaside, Isola Rossa Appartamenti Paduledda offers apartments, BBQ facilities and free WiFi in public areas. The renovated accommodation features a seating and dining area with TV, a fully equipped kitchen and a bathroom. Sports activities such as cycling, fishing, windsurfing or tennis are available nearby. The apartments come with a patio or terrace and some overlook the sea. Appartamenti Isola Rossa is close to local shops and bars where you can enjoy your breakfast. Sassari can be reached in 1 hour by car. Parking on site is free. Show full description

Hotel rating: 8.4 (very good)

Rooms: 9

Price: to show price

Distance: 34 km

Show room prices

9 Residence Portorotondo Asfodeli

27+

images

Apartment hotel. Featuring sea views, Residence Portorotondo Asfodeli provides accommodation with water sports facilities, a garden and a tennis court, around 100 metres from Spiaggia Punta Nuraghe. This beachfront property offers access to table tennis, free private parking and free WiFi. For guests with children, the aparthotel offers kids pool, outdoor play equipment and a kids' club. Guests at Residence Portorotondo Asfodeli can enjoy windsurfing and canoeing nearby, or make the most of the sun terrace. The property features services including meeting and banquet facilities and evening entertainment. The aparthotel provides guests with a balcony, a seating area, a flat-screen TV, a fully equipped kitchen with a fridge and a stovetop, and a private bathroom with bidet and free toiletries. Units include a safety deposit box and some rooms will provide you with garden views. At the aparthotel, all units include bed linen and towels. There is a coffee shop, and packed lunches are also available. Guests can stay active with the fitness classes held on site. Punta Asfodeli Beach is 800 metres from the accommodation, while Olbia Harbour is 18 km away. The nearest airport is Olbia Costa Smeralda Airport, 18 km from Residence Portorotondo Asfodeli. Show full description

Hotel rating: 7 (pleasant)

Rooms: 12

Price: to show price

Distance: 19 km

Show room prices

10 Hotel Corallaro

27+

images

Offering an outdoor pool and sea-view sun terrace, Hotel Corallaro is in Santa Teresa di Gallura's historical centre, 200 metres from the popular Rena Bianca beach. WiFi is free. Isola dei Gabbiani, famous for kite surfing activities, is reachable by car in 30 minutes. Air-conditioned rooms at the Corallaro include satellite TV and a private bathroom with hairdryer. Most rooms were recently renovated and have marine-style dÃ©cor. Some rooms have a sea view. In summer, the restaurant is open for lunch and dinner and serves both international and Sardinian specialities, including sea-food dishes. Themed dinners are also arranged. Guests here can enjoy excursions on the propertyâs own boat and go fishing. A treadmill and exercise bike are also available to guests. The ferry port is 1 km away with links to Corsica. A free shuttle service to the beach is available. Show full description

Hotel rating: 8.7 (fabulous)

Rooms: 10

Stars: 4

Price: to show price

Distance: 30 km

Show room prices

11 Bagaglino I Giardini Di Porto Cervo

27+

images

Featuring a bublic beach and an Ã la carte restaurant, Bagaglino I Giardini Di Porto Cervo offers self-catering apartments with views of Sardinia's Emerald Coast. The building is 2 km from Porto Cervo, the most famous resort of the coast. At I Giardini Di Porto Cervo you will also find a beach volley court, five-a-side football field, and rental of kite surf and wind surf. With traditional old style Emerald coast furnishings, apartments come with free parking, a patio or terrace, and an LCD TV. Free Wi-Fi is available in the lobby. Guests can enjoy 2 sun loungers on the public beach. Massages and beauty treatments are available on request. Shuttles to Olbia Airport, the harbour, and Golfo Aranci can be organised on request. Show full description

Hotel rating: 8.4 (very good)

Rooms: 10

Stars: 4

Price: to show price

Distance: 24 km

Show room prices

12 Hotel Daniel

27+

images

Featuring a private beach area in Porto Istana, 2.5 km away, Hotel Daniel offers rooms with a patio or terrace in Murta Maria. Parking is free at the property. The Marina Maria beach is 1.5 km away and is recommended for windsurfing and sailing. All rooms come with air conditioning and a minibar.The en-suite bathroom has free toiletries and hairdryer. Breakfast is offered on the ground floor, and it features traditional products of Sardinia. Guests can rent parasols and deck chairs on the beach. Many tournaments are organised at the 5-a-side football pitch available on site. Bike rental is also available. The surroundings are filled with great restaurants, pizzerias, cafÃ©s and bars. Olbia and Costa Smeralda Airport is 8 km away. Show full description

Hotel rating: 8.6 (fabulous)

Rooms: 19

Stars: 3

Price: to show price

Distance: 27 km

Show room prices

13 Le Villette al Centro

27+

images

Holiday Home. Located in different locations in San Teodoro in the Sardinia Region, 22 km from Olbia, Le Villette al Centro boasts a barbecue and terrace. Posada is 16 km away. Bike hire is available at the property and the area is popular for horse riding and windsurfing. Guests can enjoy various activities in the surroundings, including diving and hiking. All units are set within 1.8 km of the nearest beach and have a living/dining area. Some units feature a terrace and/or balcony with garden views. All units include a kitchen equipped with a refrigerator and stovetop. Porto Cervo is 43 km from Le Villette al Centro. The nearest airport is Olbia Costa Smeralda Airport, 19 km from Le Villette al Centro. Show full description

Hotel rating: 7.7 (pleasant)

Rooms: 16

Price: to show price

Distance: 39 km

Show room prices

14 Camping Village Baia Blu La Tortuga

27+

images

Holiday Park. Set on the east coast of North Sardinia, only steps away from its own private beach, this campsite features a range of sports and leisure facilities, including a tennis court, a beach volley court, a water park and a children's playground. Camping Village Baia Blu La Tortuga is 10 km outside Aglientu. Windsurfing and sailing are among the activities available at Baia Blu La Tortuga. It is 20 minutes' drive from Santa Teresa Gallura, which is Sardinia's most northern tip. Olbia port and Olbia - Costa Smeralda Airport are just over 1 hour's drive away. All with a furnished patio, mobile homes feature a satellite TV, plus a fridge and a private bathroom with shower. Each one has a free parking space and some have a kitchenette. A rich entertainment programme is also available for children over five years old. You will find a launderette, a supermarket, a mini market and a beach kiosk on-site. Breakfast, lunch and dinner are available in the self-service restaurant. Show full description

Hotel rating: 8 (very good)

Rooms: 31

Price: to show price

Distance: 25 km

Show room prices

15 Bed and Breakfast Li Paduli Alvi

27+

images

Bed and Breakfast. Just 500 metres from the free beach at Tanca Manna, Li Paduli Alvi offers rooms with free Wi-Fi and a private patio. In summer, breakfast is served out on the veranda overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. Popular local activities include kayaking, wind surfing and quad excursions. Li Paduli Alvi is 2 km from Cannigione and has excellent bus links to Olbia Airport and towns along Sardinia's famous Emerald Coast. You have discounts at partner beaches located nearby. Rooms have classic decor and a private bathroom. Free parking is provided and breakfast includes cereals, cakes and fruit juices. Guests have discounts at a local restaurant, and on boat tours. You can take a boat up to La Maddalena Archipelago. Show full description

Hotel rating: 6.6 (okay)

Rooms: 4

Price: to show price

Distance: 19 km

Show room prices

16 Due Lune Puntaldia Resort & Golf

27+

images

Luxury Hotel. The Due Lune Puntaldia Resort & Golf is located on the north-east coast of Sardinia. It offers panoramic views of the coastline, a 9-hole golf course and many sports and leisure facilities. There is also a fitness and wellness centre, together with tennis courts, windsurfing and scuba diving. All rooms at the Due Lune Puntaldia Resort & Golf are air conditioned and have views of the sea or hotel gardens from the balcony or patio. Each has a private bathroom, satellite TV and minibar. The Due Lune Puntaldia Resort & Golf has a restaurant and bar around the swimming pool. The hotel is 34 km from Olbia which has both an airport and a port with connections to Genoa, Leghorn and Civitavecchia. Show full description

Hotel rating: 8.5 (very good)

Rooms: 25

Stars: 5

Price: to show price

Distance: 38 km

Show room prices

17 Case Vacanza Onda e Riva

27+

images

Holiday Home. Situated within 400 metres of Spiaggia Capannizza and 1.4 km of Spiaggia e pineta Salamaghe, Case Vacanza Onda e Riva provides rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Budoni. With garden views, this accommodation offers a patio. Guests at the holiday home will be able to enjoy activities in and around Budoni, like cycling, fishing and walking tours. If you would like to discover the area, snorkelling, windsurfing and diving are possible in the surroundings and Case Vacanza Onda e Riva can arrange a car rental service. There is free private parking and the property features paid airport shuttle service. All units comprise a seating area with a sofa, a dining area, and a fully equipped kitchen with various cooking facilities, including an oven, a fridge, a stovetop and kitchenware. With a private bathroom fitted with a bidet and free toiletries, units at the holiday home also feature free WiFi. At the holiday home, units have bed linen and towels. For those times when you'd rather not dine out, you can choose to cook on the barbecue. Spiaggia di Budoni is 1.5 km from the accommodation, while Isola di Tavolara is 25 km from the property. The nearest airport is Olbia Costa Smeralda Airport, 36 km from Case Vacanza Onda e Riva. Show full description

Hotel rating: 8.9 (fabulous)

Rooms: 4

Price: to show price

Distance: 47 km

Show room prices

Is it only surf hotels you're looking for? Here are our other lists for Sant Antonio Di Gallura:

Cycling Hotels Golf Hotels Show more lists

18 Il Ginepro

27+

images

Guest House. Boasting garden views, Il Ginepro offers accommodation with balcony, around 2.2 km from Spiaggia di San Pietro. Featuring a 24-hour front desk, this property also provides guests with an outdoor fireplace. Guests can enjoy a meal at an outdoor dining area at the guest house. Guests at the guest house will be able to enjoy activities in and around Valledoria, like windsurfing, cycling and fishing. The guest house provides rooms with air conditioning, free private parking and free WiFi. At the guest house, all units come with a wardrobe, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. There is also a well-fitted kitchen in some of the units equipped with an oven, a stovetop, and kitchenware. Barbecue facilities are available at the guest house, and guests can also relax in the garden or go on a picnic in the picnic area. Sassari Railway Station is 42 km from Il Ginepro, while Palazzo Ducale Sassari is 42 km away. The nearest airport is Alghero Airport, 69 km from the accommodation. Show full description

Hotel rating: 9.1 (superb)

Rooms: 7

Price: to show price

Distance: 40 km

Show room prices

19 Sa Fiorida Appartamenti

27+

images

Apartment hotel. Sa Fiorida is just 450 metres from the white sands of La Ciaccia beach, 2 km outside Valledoria. This peaceful, family-run residence offers well-equipped apartments with a furnished balcony or patio, plus barbecue facilities and free parking. Popular local activities include surfing and canoeing and the property's staff organise excursions to nearby towns and the Coghinas River Nature Park. All air conditioned, apartments come with wood furniture and tiled floors. They all feature a comfortable seating area, washing machine and a kitchenette, plus a satellite TV. Some overlook the sea. This property is 100 metres from the nearest restaurants and supermarkets. Sa Fiorida Case Vacanze is on the Gulf of Asinara, close to 17 km of sandy beaches. The seaside town of San Pietro a Mare is less than 10 minutes away by car. Show full description

Hotel rating: 8.6 (fabulous)

Rooms: 22

Price: to show price

Distance: 45 km

Show room prices

20 Case Vacanze Sole e Luna

27+

images

Holiday Home. Situated within less than 1 km of Matta e Peru Beach and a 11-minute walk of Riviera dei Pini Beach, Case Vacanze Sole e Luna offers rooms with air conditioning and a private bathroom in Budoni. There is a private entrance at the holiday home for the convenience of those who stay. A patio with an outdoor dining area and garden views is offered in each unit. Guests at the holiday home will be able to enjoy activities in and around Budoni, like cycling, fishing and walking tours. If you would like to discover the area, snorkelling, windsurfing and diving are possible in the surroundings and Case Vacanze Sole e Luna can arrange a car rental service. There is free private parking and the property features paid airport shuttle service. All units come with a terrace with sea views, a fully equipped kitchen with an oven and a fridge, and a private bathroom with bidet. At the holiday home, every unit comes with bed linen and towels. For those times when you'd rather not dine out, you can choose to cook on the barbecue. Baia Sant'Anna Beach is 1.5 km from the accommodation, while Isola di Tavolara is 31 km from the property. The nearest airport is Olbia Costa Smeralda Airport, 39 km from Case Vacanze Sole e Luna. Show full description

Hotel rating: 8.6 (fabulous)

Rooms: 4

Price: to show price

Distance: 51 km

Show room prices
